text: Mool Chand Sharma is Cabinet Minister of Transport in the Government of Haryana. Apart from it, he has 3 other portfolios of Mines & Geology, Skill Development & Industrial Training and Elections. Sharma is the member of the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the BJP representing the Ballabhgarh Vidhan sabha Constituency in Haryana since 2014.My Neta == References == Category:People from Rewari district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Haryana Category:Members of the Haryana Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:Haryana MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mool Chand Sharma
